title: Surja Dighal Bari.mp4
description:
Also Known as: The Ominous House

Subtitle: English

Plot: During feminine in world war II, many people died. Somehow who were survived in that time, divorced Jaigoon was one of them. She returned to village with her children and sister-in-law's family. She wanted to settle in inauspicious land in village. But she was in attention of chairman of the village. Her ex-husband wanted to remarry her as well. But she refused both. However, in the mean time she eyewitnessed a murder. For that she had suffer in otherwise.

The main theme of the plot are using prejudice, wealth, religion, prestige, social rules even nationalism continued exploitation of the working class people.

Cast: Dolly Anowar, Jahirul Haque, Roushan Jamil, Ariful Haque, Keramat Mulla, A.T.M. Shamsuzzaman, Hasan Imam, Fakrul Hasan Bairagi, Najmul Huda Bacchu, Elora Gaohor, Flora, Lenin, Sajib etc.
Cinematography : Answar Hosen
Editing        : Saidul Anam Tutul
Music          : Alauddin Ali
Writer         : Abu Ishaque 
Directors      : Sheikh Niamat Ali, Masihuddin Shaker 
  
The first government funded film.

Awards:

    9 National Awards (Bangladesh) in 1979
    6 Awards by Bangladesh Cine-Journalists Association in 1979
    Film Ducat Award in Mannheim Film Festival, Germany, 1980
    Catholic Jury Award in Mannheim Film Festival, Germany, 1980
    Evangelical Jury Award in Mannheim Film Festival, Germany, 1980
    Don Quixote Award in Figuera da Foz Film Festival, Portugal, 1980
